      • clearConnectionsToRemovedObstacleNodes

        public void clearConnectionsToRemovedObstacleNodes(T removedObstacle)
        Removes the nodes in removedObstacle from any nodes that it is connected to. Note that this method doesn't connect nodes that were obstructed by this obstacle, that needs to be done by calling reConnectNode on all of the nodes around the removedObstacle.
        Parameters:
        removedObstacle -
